content.rendered:
Directed by Raaj Shaandilyaa.

Written by Nirmaan Dsingh. Niket Pandey. Raaj Shaandilyaa.

Cast Ayushmann Khurrana(Karamveer Singh). Nushrratt Bharuccha(Mahi (as Nushrat Bharucha)). Annu Kapoor(Jagjeet Singh). Manjot Singh(Smiley). Abhishek Banerjee(Mahendra). Vijay Raaz(Rajpal Kirar). Raj Bhansali(Toto). Nidhi Bisht(Roma). Rajesh Sharma(Wji). Neela Mulherkar(Dadi (as Neela Anil Mulherkar)). Gagan Gupta(Ram Leela’s Director). Neha Saraf(Chandrakanta Kirar). Vedika Bhandari(Original Pooja). Amjad Qureshi(Auto Driver). Shashi Ranjan(Hanuman). Rohit Tiwari(Rajpal’s senior officer). Rati Shankar Tripathi(Ghazal Singer). Deevakar Solanki(Loan Recovery Agent). Sidharth Bhardwaj(Constable Jawaahar) . Bobby Arora(Sardarji Caller).Rahul Jaykar Arya. Habib Azmi(Qaazi Saheb). Yash Chaturvedi(Yash). Abhishek Gaikwad(Customer number 1). Devendra Patel(Auto Driver). Umair Patel(Musical Artist). Harsh Shashwat(Press promoter). Samiran Singh(Shubham). Vinod Surya(Bablu).Asha Vyas

Language Hindi.

Producers Rituparna Chowdhury. Ekta Kapoor. Shobha Kapoor. Sumit Dinkar Pol. Kshitij Prasad. Raj Saluja. Sandeep Sharma. Ruchikaa Kapoor Sheikh. Aashish Singh. Vishal Vats.

Production Balaji Motion Pictures. Prime Focus. Spark Motion Pictures and Animation.
